name: Remontel Toddy
description: This hot toddy takes a swing south of the border. It's spicy and smoky, just a little bit sweet, and a perfect companion for a cold night.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounces mezcal such as Mezcal Vago Elote

recipeInstructions.text: Combine agave nectar and hot water in a mug or serving glass, stir until dissolved. Add mezcal, Chartreuse, ginger beer, mole bitters, and Angostura bitters. Stir and add cinnamon stick.
Press lime zest and mint between your hands. Drop into toddy and serve.
